Item.Name: ID
Item.Hint: Identification Number; press LIST for name/id search

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
G$_SEL_SPRIDEN_PIDM_NAME ( :ID,
 'KEYBLCK_NAME',
 'Y',
 :PIDM ) ;
 IF :PIDM IS NULL THEN
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF ;
--
 IF :GLOBAL.NEW_ID IS NOT NULL THEN
 MESSAGE ( '*WARNING* Previous ID number replaced '
 || 'with current ID number.' ) ;
 :ID := :GLOBAL.NEW_ID ;
 END IF ;
--
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT SPBPERS_PIDM
 FROM SPBPERS
 WHERE SPBPERS_DEAD_IND IS NOT NULL
 AND SPBPERS_PIDM = :PIDM ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
-- 20-2
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%FOUND,
'*WARNING* Person is deceased.', FALSE);
 END ;

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 SELECT STVVETC_DESC
 INTO :STVVETC_DESC
 FROM SATURN.STVVETC
 WHERE STVVETC_CODE = :RXRVETN_VETC_CODE ;
END ;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 SELECT STVVETC_DESC
 INTO :STVVETC_DESC
 FROM SATURN.STVVETC
 WHERE STVVETC_CODE = :RXRVETN_VETC_CODE ;
END ;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_4_0_B2K
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_4_0_B2K IS
/*
AUDIT TRAIL: 4.0
1. VM 09/15/98
 Enhancements for Banner2000 4.0 upgrade. These include replacing the toolbar
 object group which contains the new horizontal and vertical toolbars, the 
 navigational frame. Also changes the coordinate system to REAL and resizes
 the windows and canvases. Changes to name visual attributes, many new property
 classes and reduced number of redundant triggers. See the General 4.0 TRM 
 for more details.
2. CL 02/05/99
 Phase II UI Changes.

AUDIT TRAIL END
*/
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_4_0
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_4_0 IS
/*
AUDIT TRAIL: 4.0
1. Value Based Security modifications. Added code to call
 procedure R$_CHECKVBS. HCR 11/18/98
AUDIT TRAIL: 4.7
1. Defect 36321
 Added CREATE_RORSAPR trigger to insert a record into
 RORSAPR if it does not exist for the person.
 Also modified CREATE_RORSTAT to call the new trigger
 if RORSTAT record is successfully created. NP 07/12/2000 
AUDIT TRAIL END
*/
BEGIN
 NULL; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: ATVI_AUDIT_TRAIL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE ATVI_AUDIT_TRAIL IS
BEGIN
 /* **************** TVI Audit Trail ***********
1. 01-JUN-01 SPeterson
 Created RZAVETN using ROAUSDF 4.7 as template.
2. 30-JUL-02 Converted to Forms6i SPeterson
 */
 
 NULL;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CNM_AUDIT_TRAIL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE CNM_AUDIT_TRAIL IS
/* CNM AUDIT TRAIL

 CNMCCWR3672 LVarnedoe 04-NOV-09
 Added RXRVETN_USER_ID and RXRVETI_USER_ID to the RXRVETN and RXRVETI
 Data Blocks respectively. Then added them to the RZAVETN_1_CANVAS. The 
 purpose of these additions is to record who inserts or updates the form's
 information.
 
 CNMCCWR#7325 LVarnedoe 27-APR-2016
 Lee and Ian requested that the rxrvetn_term_code_va show in descending order.
 Updated rxrvetn property palette.
 
 END CNM AUDIT TRAIL
*/ 
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

Trigger.Name: OPTIONS_TRIGGER
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER('CHECK_KEYS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 IF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK = 'KEY_BLOCK' THEN
 NEXT_BLOCK ;
 GO_ITEM(:GLOBAL.GUROPTM_NAME1);
 ELSE
 GO_ITEM(:GLOBAL.GUROPTM_NAME1);
 END IF ;

Trigger.Name: WHEN_NEW_BLOCK_INSTANCE_TRG
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :CHECK_KEYS = 'Y' THEN
 :CHECK_KEYS:='N';
 :WORK_ITEM := :SYSTEM.CURSOR_ITEM;
 GO_BLOCK('KEY_BLOCK') ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_KEYS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;

 NEXT_BLOCK ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_QUERY ;
 IF :WORK_ITEM IS NOT NULL THEN
 GO_ITEM(:WORK_ITEM);
 END IF;
 :CHECK_KEYS := 'N' ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('DISABLE_KEYS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: MENU_TRIGGER
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- BLOCK_MENU ;
--
 IF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK = 'KEY_BLOCK' THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'SAVE_KEYS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 CLEAR_FORM ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 R$_LOAD_FORM_HEADER;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 NEXT_BLOCK ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'GLOBAL_COPY' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSE
 EXECUTE_QUERY ;
 END IF ;

Trigger.Name: GLOBAL_COPY
Trigger.TriggerText:
:CURRENT_USER := :GLOBAL.CURRENT_USER ;
 :ID := :GLOBAL.KEY_IDNO ;
 :PIDM := :GLOBAL.PIDM ;
--
-- 216-1 Force next fields to display descriptions
 NEXT_FIELD;
--
-- 216-1 Remove following test
-- IF :ID IS NOT NULL THEN
-- NEXT_FIELD ;
-- END IF ;

Trigger.Name: ENABLE_KEYS
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ID',ENABLED) = 'FALSE' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ID',ENABLED,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ID',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
END IF;
--
IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ID_LBT',ENABLED) = 'FALSE' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ID_LBT',ENABLED,PROPERTY_ON);
END IF;

Trigger.Name: CLR_FORM
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'SAVE_KEYS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'ENABLE_KEYS' ) ;
 CLEAR_FORM ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 R$_LOAD_FORM_HEADER;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('LOAD_CURRENT_RELEASE');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'GLOBAL_COPY' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_KEYS
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :ID IS NULL THEN
 MESSAGE(
 '*ERROR* All keys must be entered for this function' )
 ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
R$_LOAD_FORM_HEADER;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'GLOBAL_COPY' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 G$_SET_INST_PROPERTY;
 G$_SET_WIN_PROPERTY;
--31-1
-- IF NVL (:GLOBAL.CALLING_FORM, 'GUAMENU') = 'GUAMENU' THEN
 IF NVL ( :GLOBAL.CALLING_FORM, :GLOBAL.MENU_FORM ) = :GLOBAL.MENU_FORM THEN

 RETURN ;
 ELSE
 NEXT_BLOCK ;
 END IF ;
